page.title: 15Three Playground Games 1
page.content: {1. Chinese Skipping { 2. Queenio Coco 3. Hide and Seek. To do Chinese Skipping you need about 3 metres of elastic and three or more people.You tie the elastic in a knot at one end so it is a whole thing.Two people stand in at each end and the other one jumps from side to side over the elastic and in between. You can make up your own jumps and songs to go with them. "Queenio Coco" is a ball game.All you need is a tennis ball and four or more people.One person is queenio coco and she turns away and throws the ball behind her.The other people run to catch the ball and when one of them gets the ball they stand together in a group and sing."Queenio coco who's got the ball?" "I haven't got it it isn't in my pocket.Queenio coco who's got the ball?"
